list.name: list
list.description: List the guessed answers in the current round

logic.name: logic
logic.description: An explanation of the logic used

categories.name: categories
categories.description: Select which categories to include (Admin Only)

typo.name: typo
typo.description: Report a typo in the current list

bug.name: bug
bug.description: Report a bug with the bot

feature.name: feature
feature.description: Recommend a new feature for the bot

sentences.skipConfirm: Skipping {{list}} in {{skipDelay}} seconds. Type /veto to cancel or have someone else type /skip to confirm.
sentences.skipDenial: Get someone else to confirm your skip request!
sentences.skipVeto:
Skip vetoed by {{name}}
No skipping allowed for {{vetoDelay}} seconds
sentences.skipAbort:
Skip vetoed by {{name}} giving a correct answer
No skipping allowed for {{vetoDelay}} seconds
sentences.skipNotFound: I can't find a skip request, {{name}}
sentences.skipShortBan: Banned {{name}} from skipping again for {{delay}} seconds
sentences.skipBanThreat: If you skip again within {{delay}} seconds, {{name}}, you will be banned from skipping for 1 hour
sentences.addedListToQueue: {{list}} added to the queue, {{name}}. Type /lists to see the queue
sentences.addOwnList: Note that you can add your own lists at https://belgocanadian.com/tenthings
sentences.corroboratBan: Does someone agree to banning list "{{list}}"?
sentences.inactivity:
I'm sleeping, type /list or /start to wake me up.
I go to sleep after 30 days of inactivity.
sentences.introduction:
Hi {{name}},
Ten Things, yours truly, is a game which will give you a subject and then you answer anything that comes to mind in that category.
Type /commands to see all the things you can ask me
If you want to add your own lists, please go to https://belgocanadian.com/tenthings
Have fun!
sentences.newRound: A new round will start in 2 seconds

warnings.minimum1Category: A minimum of 1 category is required
warnings.adminFunction: Sorry {{name}}, this is a chat admin function
warnings.fullQueue: The queue already has the maximum of 10 lists, {{name}}
warnings.corroborateBanBySamePlayer: Get someone else to confirm the ban, {{name}}!

rules: If an answer is 100% correct it will immediately be awarded to the guesser
If an answer is over 75% correct it will be awarded after (2 * correctness percentage) seconds if no better answer is provided
Non-alphanumerical signs and letter cases are ignored when determining correctness
Points scored = (Max hints {{maxHints}} - hints asked + # of current players) * (answer accuracy % - 0.6) * 2.5
Hints are revealed in this order: first letters, last letters, vowels, and the rest. The rest will be revealed from least frequent to most frequent letter
There is a 10 second cooldown between asking hints
A list can be skipped if 2 players /skip it
If only 1 player skips a list there will be a 10 second cooldown until the list is skipped
A skip can be cancelled by anyone by typing /veto or a correct answer
If a skip is vetoed, new skips will be ignored for 15 seconds
Every day at midnight (universal time) the daily scores will be reset and a winner recorded
Spammers will be ignored until they are silent for at least 10 seconds
